member.summary: LiteGraph client.

member.summary: Logger settings.

member.summary: Maximum supported statement length.

member.name: P:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.NodeGuidProperty
member.summary: GUID property that must be present in every node added to the graph.

member.summary: GUID property that must be present in every edge added to the graph.

member.summary: JSON.NET formatting mode.

member.summary: LiteGraph client.

member.summary: Tear down the client and dispose of resources.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.AddNode(System.String)
member.summary: Add a node. The supplied JSON must contain the globally-unique identifier property as specified in GuidProperty.
member.param: JSON object, which must include the globally-unique identifier property as specified in NodeGuidProperty.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.UpdateNode(System.String)
member.summary: Update a node. The supplied JSON must contain the globally-unique identifier property as specified in GuidProperty.
member.param: JSON object, which must include the globally-unique identifier property as specified in NodeGuidProperty.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.RemoveNode(System.String)
member.summary: Remove a node and its edges by the node's globally-unique identifier.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.NodeExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if a node exists by its globally-unique identifier.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.EdgeExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check if an edge exists by its globally-unique identifier.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.AddEdge(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add an edge from one node to another.
member.param: Globally-unique identifier of the source node.
Globally-unique identifier of the target node.
JSON object, which must include the globally-unique identifier property as specified in EdgeGuidProperty.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.RemoveEdge(System.String)
member.summary: Remove an edge by its globally-unique identifier.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.UpdateEdge(System.String)
member.summary: Update an edge's properties.
member.param: JSON object, which must include the globally-unique identifier property as specified in EdgeGuidProperty.

member.summary: Retrieve all nodes.

member.summary: Retrieve a node.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.GetAllEdges
member.summary: Retrieve all edges.

member.summary: Retrieve all edges to or from a given node.
member.param: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.GetEdge(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve an edge.

member.name: M:LiteGraph.LiteGraphClient.GetNeighbors(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieve a node's neighbors.
member.param: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.summary: Search nodes.
member.param: Subset of node GUIDs to search.
Filters to apply against each node's JSON data.
Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.summary: Search edges.
member.param: Subset of edge GUIDs, from node GUIDs, and to node GUIDs to search.

Maximum number of results to retrieve.

member.summary: Available conditions for search filters.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.Equals
member.summary: The left and right terms are equal to one another.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.NotEquals
member.summary: The left and right terms are not equal to one another.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.GreaterThan
member.summary: The left term is greater than the right term.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.GreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The left term is greater than or equal to the right term.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.LessThan
member.summary: The left term is less than the right term.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.LessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The left term is less than or equal to the right term.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.IsNull
member.summary: The left term is null.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.IsNotNull
member.summary: The left term is not null.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.Contains
member.summary: The left term is contained within the right term (list).

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.ContainsNot
member.summary: The left term is not contained within the right term (list).

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.StartsWith
member.summary: The left term starts with the right term.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchCondition.EndsWith
member.summary: The left term ends with the right term.

member.name: T:LiteGraph.SearchFilter
member.summary: A search filter.

member.name: P:LiteGraph.SearchFilter.Field
member.summary: The field upon which to match.

member.name: F:LiteGraph.SearchFilter.Condition
member.summary: The condition by which the parsed document's content is evaluated against the supplied value.

member.name: P:LiteGraph.SearchFilter.Value
member.summary: The value to be evaluated using the specified condition against the parsed document's content. When using GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqualTo, LessThan, or LessThanOrEqualTo, the value supplied must be convertible to decimal.

member.summary: Instantiate the object.

member.summary: Evaluates a value against the search filter.
